abstract: After nearly seven years, the same Justice Department that can find no one on Wall Street to hold responsible for our financial calamity has remained ever vigilant on the trail of those two corporate vagabonds, David Wittig and Douglas Lake, the masterminds behind the so-called “Enron of Kansas,” William D. Cohan writes at Opinionator.
snippet: After nearly seven years, the same Justice Department that can find no one on Wall Street to hold responsible for our financial calamity has remained ever vigilant on the trail of those two corporate vagabonds, David Wittig and Douglas Lake, the m...
lead_paragraph: From William D. Cohan at Opinionator:

headline.main: Cohan: What Happened at the ‘Enron of Kansas’?

abstract: Daniel Schorr, the longtime journalist for CBS and NPR, has died at 93.
snippet: Daniel Schorr, the longtime journalist for CBS and NPR, has died at 93.
lead_paragraph: Robert D. Hershey Jr. has the Times obituary:

headline.main: Daniel Schorr, Journalist, Enemy Of Nixon and His Own Bosses, Dies at 93
